import React, {createContext, useState} from 'react' import About from './Components/About' import Contact from './Components/Contact' import Footer from './Components/Footer' import MainBanner from './Components/MainBanner' import NavBar from './Components/NavBar' import NavMenu from './Components/NavMenu' import Projects from './Components/Projects' export const ThemeContext = createContext() export default function Portfolio() { const [darkMode, setDarkMode] = useState(false) function toggleDarkMode() { setDarkMode(prev => !prev) } return (
) }
